completion_requirements: The MTurk Assistant says you can end the conversation.
completion_questions: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?
task_descriptions: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk bot. Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk bot has told you to do so.
linear_guide: You (`CustomerName-1@ride`) and your partner `CustomerName-2@ride` are planning your well-deserved vacation. Together, you sit in front of your laptop and start up your new personal assistant. Perhaps it can help? Say hello!
Find out what the assistant can do for you.

Use the assistant's abilities to make some arrangements for your upcoming holiday. You can come up with any details, but here are a few things to know: 

* You live in `City-1@plane`
* You either want to stay at your home city, or have your vacation near `City-2@plane`
* You have `SmallNumber@generic` kid(s)
`CustomerName-2@ride` says: all this vacation planning is making me hungry. Can we order some `Food-1@restaurant`?
Your child `CustomerName-3@ride` comes in and exclaims 'I want `Food-2@restaurant`'!
Make sure you have at least made one arrangement for your upcoming holiday (e.g. booked a flight or a hotel). Then you can lead the conversation to a natural close.

Wizard.task_description: Follow the flow charts and help the user. (You can find the single-task video tutorial under https://youtu.be/USrWF1ZyNWw, in case you want to watch it again.)
completion_questions: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? If yes, send us a mail and let us know how we can improve the task.
